Screenshots (Click to enlarge)



Repack Features

  • Based on UNYIELDER-TENOKE ISO release: tenoke-unyielder.iso (14,939,006,976 bytes)
  • Game version: v1.0.1
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 13.9 to 8.5 GB)
  • Installation takes 14-30 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 13.6 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 3 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
UNYIELDER unites Looter-Shooters, Movement FPS and Character Action Games in an infinitely expandable Roguelite to create Spectacular, Absurd and Chaotic Boss battles.

EREBUS, THE CAPITAL CITY OF ANTARCTICA, 1972 – A hotspot for apocalyptic-level events, after decades of existential torment, EREBUS finally collapsed. Towering derelicts of the once concrete utopia are buried in dunes of rust: “PNEUMA”, a by-product of entropic weapons; Man-made “Heaven”.
CARVE YOUR PATH – Journey through the war-torn lands of EREBUS, Defeat enemies, loot weapons, grow in power.
A WALKING CATACLYSM OF YOUR OWN DESIGN – Wield RUPTURE, RHAPSODY and REVERIE, volatile sources of ineffable power. Unleash your unique brand of devastation with bizarre weapons and perks.
BUILD YOUR FINAL BOSS – Scavenge the data of slain enemies and build your own Pattern of machine-god punching bag. Unique combinations alter the boss fight.

Game Features

  • BREAK THE GAME: Like any good toy, play with it vigorously, experiment. (and have fun)
  • EMBODY TENACITY: The further you go, the more dangerous the world becomes. (but so do you)
  • DOMINATION: Gather unique weapons and perks to empower your build and playstyle. (or just pick the weird stuff, who’s going to stop you?)
  • BYOBoss: With parts from enemies you defeat, customize the Final Boss.

The post UNYIELDER – v1.0.1 appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

  • RuTor [magnet]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Ale.And.Tale.Tavern.v1.5.12-TENOKE ISO release: tenoke-ale.and.tale.tavern.v1.5.12.iso (4,756,553,728 bytes)
  • Game version: v1.5.12; Bonus Soundtrack in MP3 format is included by default
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 4.4 to 1.1 GB)
  • Installation takes around one minute
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 4.4 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
You are in for a stunning mix of genres: a coop first-person fantasy tavern simulator in an open world, action, fishing, hunting, exploration, fun and diverse quests. And, of course, COOKING! Play solo or with friends and feed the entire world!

The game unfolds in a cozy and beautiful fantasy world. Step into the role of the owner of an abandoned tavern. Work alone or together with your friends to restore the former glory and popularity of the Ale & Tale tavern. Explore new recipes, participate in hunting and fishing, breed animals, grow plants, complete quests involving unique and amusing characters. Decorate your tavern. Fight against dangers. Cook dishes and drinks that will delight your visitors, and they will repay you with ringing coin! And remember: owning your own tavern is fun!! And if you want something else – just explore the world, enjoy its beauty and your complete freedom!

Dive into an ocean of fun and complete freedom of action. Play the way you want and enjoy true pleasure! The Ale & Tale tavern awaits its heroes!

Game Features

  • Play solo or with other players. Coop mode for up to 4 people.
  • Owl Helpers â€“ Automate Your Tavern!
  • Enjoy superior graphics and a dynamic game world.
  • Explore a small, handcrafted open world full of adventures and activities.
  • Complete a variety of diverse story quests and meet unique characters inhabiting the game world.
  • Engage in whatever your heart desires. Tavern management, cooking, decorating your tavern and crafting, delivering orders, growing plants, breeding animals, hunting, fishing, and much more.
  • Fight against a variety of enemies and monsters using different types of weapons.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous A&TT repack.

The post Ale & Tale Tavern – v1.5.12 + Bonus Soundtrack appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

item.title: Updates Digest for October 2, 2025
item.dc:creator: FitGirl
item.description:
Updates for the following games have been added today/yesterday. All updates can be found on their own page: Updates List in the menus on the top and on the left. All links to updates are also posted on respective game pages. All Update Digests, sorted by date âž§âž§âž§

The post Updates Digest for October 2, 2025 appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.
item.content:encoded:

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)



Repack Features

  • Based on Mind.Diver-TENOKE ISO release: tenoke-mind.diver.iso (3,897,827,328 bytes)
  • Game version: v1.0.93
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 3.6 to 1.9 GB)
  • Installation takes 1-3 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 3.6 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
Explore the Mind Ocean to solve a twisted case.

You are a Mind Diver.

Using experimental technology, you explore Lina’s Mind Ocean, fixing her memories to solve an unprecedented missing persons case. Lina’s subconscious hides many secrets, critical to unraveling the dark case.

Game Features

  • Restore broken memories and uncover the past – Every memory you investigate is missing a key detail. Anything could be the solution. Fill out the correct detail to reveal more of the past.
  • Challenging and satisfying deduction – Every solution is logical, but not obvious. You’ll need the right clues to deduce the truth. Listen to private conversations. Inspect small details. Slow down and engage your mind to make the right connections.
  • A heartbreaking love story – A couple deeply in love have both broken down. Lina is losing her memories and Sebastian has gone missing. A disturbing party seems to cover up something else. And a dark tragedy is buried deep in Lina’s mind.
  • Beautifully executed; Fully voice acted; Unique 3D-scan style; Award-winning story and puzzle design; About 6 hours of tightly paced gameplay.

The post Mind Diver – v1.0.93 appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)



Repack Features

  • Based on CORPOREAL-TiNYiSO ISO release: tn-corporeal.iso (16,182,829,056 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 15.1 to 10.8 GB)
  • Installation takes 13-25 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 15.2 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
A city built on sacred ground should never have existed. Now, the spirits demand retribution. There are certain places that humans should avoid; these locations become powerful magnets for human misery and tragedy. As a paranormal investigator, my job is to document these areas and show the world that the boogeymen are real.

Hi, welcome to my world. My name is Terrance, and along with my best friends, Tracy and Vivian, we document the paranormal. Join us on our nightly investigations. As an investigator, your task is to uncover the truth behind the hauntings in a newly developed town. Each case uncovers clues about the forgotten legends of the past and the dark mysteries that envelop this town.

You will encounter things you wish you had never seen, and they will haunt you for life. You will have to confront and defeat the boogeymen of your nightmares. In a terrifying confrontation with a malevolent force, you will narrowly escape death – only to awaken with unusual new powers.

Now, you must not only survive the hauntings but also master your newfound abilities to close the portals that are unleashing horrors into the town. Each investigation will test your wits, courage, and willpower as the boundary between worlds continues to shrink.

“The land remembers. The spirits rise. The astral realm has chosen you.”

Game Features

  • Explore a Haunted City: Wander through eerie haunted locations, an abandoned hospital, and dark forests to uncover what awakened the spirits.
  • Cleanse Cursed Locations: Methodically drive out the darkness using rituals, tools, and your growing connection to the astral plane.
  • Survive the Unspeakable: Face a nightmarish event that forces you to confront horror head-on in a desperate escape.
  • Harness Astral Powers: After your awakening, manipulate energy, glimpse into the spirit world, and seal the portals threatening to consume the town.
  • Unravel the Truth: Discover the city’s buried past and learn why its foundations are steeped in restless torment.

The post CORPOREAL appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

Game Description
A relaxing sandbox casual simulation game where you perform various, even strange, aquarium-related tasks on very diverse levels. As an Aquarist you must create and manage a home to amazing fish, sea turtles, sharks, octopuses, and more. Aquarium is their world and life. Make it worth…

Dive into the serene depths of Aquarist, a captivating underwater adventure where you become the master of your aquatic universe. Design and manage stunning aquariums, cultivating a diverse array of marine life. Learn more about underwater creatures and their behavior and take responsibility for their lives. Control the temperature and nourishment to provide a suitable environment. Will you rise to become the ultimate Aquarist?

CREATE YOU DREAM AQUARIUM
An Aquarium is a glimpse into the vast depths of the sea and the creatures that call it their home.

Customize every aspect of your underwater paradise, from the size and layout to the decorations and inhabitants. Create an aquarium in which each fish will want to live. Thanks to the variety of objects in the game, you can implement even the craziest ideas! A green, blooming oasis or raw, antique busts? The choice is yours. YOU CAN EVEN USE YOUR PHOTOGRAPH AS A BACKGROUND OF AQUARIUM!

Included DLCs:

  • Japanese Garden DLC
  • Aquatic Supermarket DLC
  • Laboratory DLC
  • American Fish DLC

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous Aquarist repacks.

Game Description
Nature’s balance lies in the paws of a transforming fox pup.

During a magical cozy adventure with open exploration, you learn abilities from animal friends and travel across diverse nature uncovering the mystery of dying nature.

The story unfolds through a beautifully handcrafted storybook.

Game Features

  • Transforming Fox: Adapt to your surroundings by transforming into either an arctic fox or a red fox.
  • Open-World Exploration: Explore colorful forests, navigate icy terrains, swim through lakes and ocean to unravel the secrets of a fading ecosystem.
  • Harmonic String Music: Experience a calmful and cozy adventure through our original string soundtrack.
  • Unique Abilities: Gliding, Swimming, Freezing, Charge Jump, Rock smashing, Telegrab and more!
  • World Restoration: Witness the color and vibrancy return to the world as you progress within the story.
  • Storybook: Immerse yourself in a narrative told through a beautifully illustrated storybook.

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)



Repack Features

  • Based on Atelier.Resleriana.The.Red.Alchemist.And.the.White.Guardian-TENOKE ISO release: tenoke-atelier.resleriana.the.red.alchemist.and.the.white.guardian.iso (12,439,951,360 bytes)
  • 6 DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless, but NOT MD5 Perfect: game files have been decrypted for better compression
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 11.6 to 7.1 GB)
  • Installation takes 5-12 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 11.6 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
The story of two protagonists as they rebuild their hometown and seek the hidden truth. Engage in timeline-based command battles and enjoy the easy-to-learn yet deeply engaging synthesis. Plus, take on shop management, explore random dungeons, and more!

Game Features

  • Field – Freely roam around the Lantarna mainland while enjoying battles and gathering materials! Players can enjoy their adventure while taking in scenery like never before, experiencing the passage of time from day to night and changes in weather. Switch between Rias and Slade anytime, each bringing their own unique field actions to the adventure!
  • Dimensional Paths – In the multi-floor dungeon Dimensional Paths, the map layout and monsters change with every challenge. The higher the difficulty, the more valuable ingredients you can obtain. Powerful enemies and treasure chests may also yield rare equipment known as Starpearls. Venture into the Dimensional Paths in pursuit of premium synthesis ingredients and coveted Starpearls!
  • Combat – Engage in thrilling battles with a highly strategic Timeline Command Battle system! Up to three party members can be placed on both the front and back rows. Enjoy fighting as one united force, and utilize new elements such as Multi-actions , Item Mix, and Link Attacks to add even more excitement to battles.
  • Synthesis – Create your own unique items using the simple yet intricate â€œGift Color Synthesisâ€! In this simple system, items can be made by adding ingredients according to the recipes. By linking the Gift Colors of ingredients, their traits will be carried over to the finished product. Players can also unlock new recipes by adding specific ingredients to certain recipes. Additionally, each recipe has three arrangement slots where extra ingredients can be added, boosting the effects of the finished product.
  • Town Development & Shop Management – Sell items created through synthesis or found while exploring! Help boost the town’s restoration activities by selling a variety of items, and then invest the profits and resources earned from the shop to develop the town further. As the town starts to bustle once again, reference books containing new synthesis recipes will be made available, and the story will develop!

Included DLCs:

  • “Midnight Costume Set” Early Distribution Costumes for Rias and Slade
  • Digital Deluxe Pack
  • “Rough Time Costume Set” for Rias and Slade
  • “Alchemist of Memories” Costumes for Rias and Slade
  • Gust Extra BGM Pack
  • Activewear Adventuring Set

The post Atelier Resleriana: The Red Alchemist & the White Guardian – Digital Deluxe Edition + 6 DLCs appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.
